channel.title: Why from other country's people can't connect?
channel.description:
Hi, This is my another question. I live in Lithunia, all people from there can login and play in my serwer, but e.g. people who live in Poland can connect only for few seconds after they are disconnect. How I can fix it? :confused:
Please guys help me, Thanks :o

item.title: Why from other country's people can't connect?
item.dc:creator: @BaaabyGames BaaabyGames
item.description:
@BaaabyGames wrote:

Well if you use a no-ip i suggest using hamachi so it worries about that sh1t not you. =/

Read full topic
